item.title: What Trump’s bitcoin binge really says to Americans about their money
item.description: When the U.S. government creates a strategic bitcoin reserve, you have to wonder about the dollar.

item.title: This new proposal could help workers fight age discrimination by giving them their day in court
item.description: The Protecting Older Americans Act would free workers from forced arbitration.

item.title: ‘I spend 5 hours a day on my portfolio’: I’m 70 and received $300K in a lawsuit. Here’s my foolproof financial plan.
item.description: “It’s important to find a way to manage your emotions to prevent them from damaging your financial and personal future.”
